bibl.title: Arkhaičeskaja Elida i Egipet: k probleme kontaktov. Avec résumé en anglais: Archaic Elis and Egypt: On the Problem of Contacts.
bibl.note: Deals with the ancient tradition about the Elean delegation sent to an Egyptian pharaoh (Psammetic II or Amasis) in order to find the best way to organize the Olympic games (cf. HERODOTUS II, 160).
bibl.seg: EVDOKIMOV P.A., Arkhaičeskaja Elida i Egipet: k probleme kontaktov. Avec résumé en anglais: Archaic Elis and Egypt: On the Problem of Contacts.
Deals with the ancient tradition about the Elean delegation sent to an Egyptian pharaoh (Psammetic II or Amasis) in order to find the best way to organize the Olympic games (cf. HERODOTUS II, 160).
